name: Fully reversible pinafore – Tea rose poplin & satin light blue cotton
description:
Simple but beautiful all year round reversible dress.
Choose print or plain to suit the mood of the little one! 
Wear alone in the spring & summer and with leggings or tights and long sleeves t-shirt when cooler.

100% organic cotton
Care : wash at 40 with logo turned inwards 
Discreet logo on the plain side of the dress 
Made in a small workshop in Bangalore, India
